name: init_counter
attributes: # [doc = " カウンターアカウント(PDA)の初期化"]
body: let counter = & mut ctx . accounts . counter ;
counter . authority = ctx . accounts . authority . key () ;
counter . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("counter") . unwrap () ;

name: increment
attributes: # [doc = " カウンターを +1 する"]
body: let counter = & mut ctx . accounts . counter ;
counter . count = counter . count . checked_add (1) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: Overflow) ? ;

name: decrement
attributes: # [doc = " カウンターを -1 する"]
body: let counter = & mut ctx . accounts . counter ;
counter . count = counter . count . checked_sub (1) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: Underflow) ? ;

fields.name: counter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA：[\"counter\", authority], bump付き。再初期化を防止"] # [account (init , seeds = [b"counter" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , payer = authority , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 1)]

fields.name: counter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " has_one＋PDA固定でauthority==counter.authorityを検証"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"counter" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = counter . bump , has_one = authority)]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 操作を許可されたユーザー"]
